name: Round Robin
description:
This is a  'Hyper-casual Android Game' made for the theme of Weekly Game Jam - week 65.

You just have to touch the screen to make the player leave the ground and start orbiting. Pick up the power ups and once a bar is full, you will be provided with a shield which protects you from the obstacles/asteroids. 

My personal best is 31! And I enjoyed very much creating this game......

This is still a prototype/WIP. the project would be released soon.
